definition: variant of 銹|锈, to corrode/to rust

sentences.english: Has the shaving cream can left ugly rust spots on your shower?
sentences.chinese: 您洗澡時，剃鬚膏會給您留下難看的鏽斑？

sentences.english: Sad is the soul of the rust.
This dissertation employs gray-scale concurrence matrix as a tool to analyze texture of rusts as well.
sentences.chinese: 最後基於灰度共生矩陣法對鏽斑進行了紋理分析。

sentences.english: The shell plating in way was seriously corroded and densely pitted .
sentences.chinese: 該處船殼板嚴重腐蝕並密集着鏽斑。

sentences.english: Please scour rust spots from the knife.
Rust spot is the most common in all symptoms of marble.
sentences.chinese: 在大理石材料產生的衆多病症中，鏽斑是最爲常見的。

sentences.english: It is allowed to have a little rust on the brim of steel plate.
sentences.chinese: 鋼板面或邊緣有少許鏽斑是允許的。

definition: the spongy, white pulp inside the stem of rush plants, used as a wick for oil lamps
case for an ink stone or ink slab
item made from woven silk or rayon
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
